responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "A077CF8D40E0CA01C3AB51AF03EE82FE", "\"The wonders of the future abound. It is a time of utopia. However, no exalted shall experience such serenity. No. The meek have inherited Verra, or rather, the gobbun. They appear to be an intelligent evolution of the savage ancestors we all knew. But as with all society, not is all as it seems on the surface. After befriending these gobbun, I discovered their civilization is built atop a well of unbound essence, a prison to the one some call Volton, the life giver.")
name: MIDD_0015_AAV_ClockworkCodex_9
